articles.title: Revolution make hiring of coach Marko Mitrović official
articles.description:
“It’s an honor to join the Revolution and become the new head coach of this storied club.”

The post Revolution make hiring of coach Marko Mitrović official appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marko Mitrović officially appointed as head coach of New England Revolution on November 7, 2025.
Mitrović expressed honor in joining the storied club, aiming to enhance team performance.
Local fans anticipate improved results and community engagement under Mitrović's leadership.

articles.title: ‘It was obvious’: Lucas Giolito not surprised Red Sox didn’t extend him qualifying offer
articles.description:
The Red Sox could've given Giolito a one-year, $22.05 million qualifying offer, which could've given Boston draft compensation if the pitcher leaves in free agency.

The post ‘It was obvious’: Lucas Giolito not surprised Red Sox didn’t extend him qualifying offer appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox chose not to extend Lucas Giolito a $22.05 million qualifying offer.
Giolito expressed no surprise at the decision, indicating it was expected.
Boston misses potential draft compensation if Giolito signs elsewhere in free agency.

articles.title: Yellow and lime green, this $4.8M Provincetown house was an artists’ retreat: ‘A house with a soul’
articles.description:
“The entire house is built by Provincetown artists down to the tiles."

The post Yellow and lime green, this $4.8M Provincetown house was an artists’ retreat: ‘A house with a soul’ appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Provincetown house, valued at $4.8M, was built by local artists.
House features unique tiles and design elements created by Provincetown artists.
The sale highlights the ongoing demand for artistically significant properties in Cape Cod.

articles.title: Meet Jennifer Coolfridge — Brookline’s community fridge fighting food insecurity
articles.description:
A playfully named community fridge — inspired by Boston native Jennifer Coolidge — is helping Brookline residents put food on the table.

The post Meet Jennifer Coolfridge — Brookline’s community fridge fighting food insecurity appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Brookline's community fridge, named Jennifer Coolfridge, combats local food insecurity.
The fridge provides free food access to residents in need, inspired by Jennifer Coolidge.
This initiative aims to support families struggling with food access in Brookline.

articles.title: What the Patriots’ Carlton Davis said about returning to Tampa
articles.description:
"We talked about it today, he was just talking about how it was going to be weird."

The post What the Patriots’ Carlton Davis said about returning to Tampa appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots' Carlton Davis discussed his upcoming return to Tampa Bay.
Davis expressed that the return will feel 'weird' for him.
Boston fans anticipate how Davis's feelings may affect team performance.

articles.title: Need a cozy book recommendation? Take our quiz.
articles.description:
Answer a few fun questions and we’ll match you with the perfect comfort read for fall and winter.

summary: Take a quiz to find your ideal cozy book for the fall and winter.

Encourages Boston residents to engage with literature during colder months.

articles.title: Get the ultimate guide to cozy reading
articles.description:
Every reader has their version of cozy. We’re here to help you find yours.

The post Get the ultimate guide to cozy reading appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Discover personalized cozy reading styles for Boston residents in the new guide.
Explore local bookstores featured in the guide for unique reading experiences.
